name: PEKO
description: PEKO is a high-energy memecoin fueled by community hype and unstoppable optimism. Designed for degens and dreamers, it’s the token that screams "Let’s Freakin’ Go!"—rallying holders to push boundaries, chase gains, and vibe with the crypto chaos. Fast, fun, and fearless, PEKO is your ticket to the meme-fueled rocket ride! We have a LOT of stuff planned, From Burn wallets to contests & Games, AND WE ARE JUST GETTING STARTED
